page.title: 17MANAGER, BARCLAYS BANK
page.content: He has held his present post for just over 2 years. He is manager of 2 branches: Edgware and Burnt Oak. They have a management team of 4 people, who supervise 66 other staff. They alternate jobs between branches. Edgware Branch was built in 1984 but Burnt Oak Branch was opened in 1890. Opening hours are 0930-1530. Because of competition they also open on Saturday mornings to bring in more custom. Both branches are busiest on Monday mornings because shopkeepers bring in the weekend's takings then. Also, the beginnings and endings of the month are busy times. The Manager regards his job as demanding but very interesting. He sees it, essentially, as helping others to solve their problems.
